by Lalaloopsy
43 customer reviews
| 8 answered questions
List Price: $199.99
Price: $199.95 Free Shipping for Prime Members
You Save: $0.04
Note: Available at a lower price from other sellers, potentially without free Prime shipping.
Only 2 left in stock.
Sold by Kent Toys and Fulfilled by Amazon. Gift-wrap available.

Fulfillment by Amazon (FBA) is a service we offer sellers that lets them store their products in Amazon's fulfillment centers, and we directly pack, ship, and provide customer service for these products. Something we hope you'll especially enjoy: FBA items qualify for FREE Shipping and .

If you're a seller, Fulfillment by Amazon can help you increase your sales. We invite you to learn more about Fulfillment by Amazon .

  • Includes 4 mini-doll figures: Emma, Stephanie, Instructor Theresa and Ella
  • Features 2 two-story buildings: the camp canteen, classroom, 2 bedrooms, bath house with toilet, horse staging area and paddock
  • Includes a mini-bus with seats for all 4 mini-doll figures and a detachable trailer
  • Animals include hedgehog and 3 different colored horses: Champion, Foxy and Sunshine
  • Accessories include camera, storybook, riding helmets, croissants, salad, sausages, dining furniture, blackboard, 3 saddles, 3 bridles, pitch fork, whip, bonfire, marshmallows, cups; animal accessory set: brushes, comb, bows, hairspray, soap and prize ribbons; and flower accessory set: flowers, ladybirds and butterflies

22 of 28 people found the following review helpful
Bought this at Toys R Us this Aug 2012 for $109.
By Dolly Gallagher on September 3, 2012
This is a Christmas gift for my 8 year old daughter. She is loving Legos all the sudden. Finally - Legos got smart and has developed this line specifically for girls - I hope they continue and we see more and more. Honestly, this set has not been opened yet - so I can only gauge the quality based on the several other sets we've purchased - overall very happy. But the price here is a rip off, and I picked this item up at Toys R Us for $109. I purchased it online and had it shipped for free to the closest store for pickup. Very convenient - and a much better price.

5 of 5 people found the following review helpful
3 hours of silence
By Lyndsay on February 10, 2013
Verified Purchase
Bought this for my ten year old for Christmas. We both loved it. She spent three straight hours putting it together and the only comments were her telling us which book of instructions she was on. She's huge into horses and Legos so this was a great combination. She then spent the next couple of days playing with them (I'm sure it would have been longer if little brothers weren't starting to break it apart). For anyone who hasn't bought the friends version before, they're fabulous for girls, and just like regular Legos that can be mixed and matched. We have bins full and the only difference is the color scheme. I was a bit hesitant because this was the largest, most expensive set we've bought so far, but it was worth the money.
